files.description: This R script constructs the data sets used in sections 3, 4, 5, and web appendices D and E of the article. The data files called by this script cannot be shared due to license agreements. However a public version of the output written by this script is provided
files.label: 3_Matching.R
categories: Replication archive for Environmental Policy and Directed Technological Change Evidence from the European carbon market

dataFile.description: This R script constructs the data sets used in sections 3, 4, 5, and web appendices D and E of the article. The data files called by this script cannot be shared due to license agreements. However a public version of the output written by this script is provided

files.description: This R script reproduces the descriptive statistics and graphs from section 3 of the article.

categories: Replication archive for Environmental Policy and Directed Technological Change Evidence from the European carbon market

dataFile.description: This R script reproduces the descriptive statistics and graphs from section 3 of the article.

files.description: This R script reproduces the estimation and graphs from sections 4 and 5, and appendices D and E of the article.
files.label: 5_Analysis_of_matched_data.R
categories: Replication archive for Environmental Policy and Directed Technological Change Evidence from the European carbon market

dataFile.description: This R script reproduces the estimation and graphs from sections 4 and 5, and appendices D and E of the article.

files.description: This workspace contains data sets that will allow the user to reproduce most of the analysis reported in sections 3, 4, 5 and appendices D and E of the article. Note that all data held under license has been removed, thus preventing complete replication.
